task.summary: Fixes mode change not taking immediate effect
Radio UI changes: Split frequency markers out as separate view. Split frequency display out as separate view. Turning off Waterfall now displays Panadater in all the space.
Radio UI changes: Split frequency markers out as separate view. Split frequency display out as separate view. Turning off Waterfall now displays Panadater in all the space.
Cleaned up step increments when using tuna knob and mouse
Fixed problem with Configure updating the same band.

MESSAGE.value: Fixes mode change not taking immediate effect
Added AGC Gain control. Moved AGC settings to Band rather then BandStack entry.
Radio UI changes: Split frequency markers out as separate view. Split frequency display out as separate view. Turning off Waterfall now displays Panadater in all the space.
Cleaned up step increments when using tuna knob and mouse
Fixed problem with Configure updating the same band.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Fixed problem with Configure updating the same band.
